item.title: missy add a quote by Rick Warren
item.description: "We are products of our past, but we don't have to be prisoners of it." -- Rick Warren

item.title: missy add a quote by Paulo Coelho
item.description: "This is what we call love. When you are loved, you can do anything in creation. When you are loved, there's no need at all to understand what's happening, because everything happens within you." -- Paulo Coelho

item.title: missy add a quote by Paulo Coelho
item.description: "Remember that wherever your heart is, there you will find your treasure." -- Paulo Coelho

item.title: missy add a quote by Paulo Coelho
item.description: "And, when you want something, all the universe conspires in helping you to achieve it." -- Paulo Coelho

item.title: missy add a quote by Paulo Coelho
item.description: "You have to take risks, he said. We will only understand the miracle of life fully when we allow the unexpected to happen. Every day, God gives us the sun--and also one moment in which we have the ability to change everything that makes us unhappy. Every day, we try to pretend that we haven't perceived that moment, that it doesn't exist--that today is the same as yesterday and will be the same as tomorrow. But if people really pay attention to their everyday lives, they will discover that magic moment. It may arrive in the instant when we are doing something mundane, like putting our front-door key in the lock; it may lie hidden in the quiet that follows the lunch hour or in the thousand and one things that all seem the same to us. But that moment exists--a moment when all the power of the stars becomes a part of us and enables us to perform miracles." -- Paulo Coelho

item.title: missy add a quote by Paulo Coelho
item.description: "We pretend to be strong because we are weak." -- Paulo Coelho

item.title: missy add a quote by Paulo Coelho
item.description: "If pain must come, may it come quickly. Because I have a life to live, and I need to live it in the best way possible. If he has to make a choice, may he make it now. Then I will either wait for him or forget him." -- Paulo Coelho
